it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.netstack

Class NetStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.netstack.NetStack

  • public class NetStack
extends java.lang.Object
    TCP/IP default stack. It is initialized at boot by reading the IP configuration file specified by the 'ipcfg' property. If the 'ipcfg' property is not set, an IP layer with only lo interface is used.
